Membership

Fenix is a member-only network to advance Asian American Women (AAW) in the investment management industry. Members include senior investment managers and is by invitation only.

General Partner
Managing Partner
Principal
Chief Investment Office

Managing Director
Director
Vice President
Head of Investments

Benefits

  • Investor Networking. Institutional, Family Offices, and High Net Worth Individuals supporting women led funds.
  • Executive Advancement. C-Suite and board seat opportunities.
  • Fenix Circles. Intimate events with other high performing AAW Investment managers.
  • Executive Coaching. Executive coaching to achieve next level performance.
  • Fen-Well Programs. Programming on topics impacting a woman's career, health, and wellness.

Contact Us

Contact our Membership team at info@fenixwoman.com
